summary: health_check uses GREEN/YELLOW/RED thresholds tied to Recovery Card modes
detail: GREEN: calls<20, tokens<50K, compactions=0. YELLOW: calls 20-35 OR tokens 50-80K OR compactions=1. RED: calls>35 OR tokens>80K OR compactions>=2. Each maps to NORMAL/REDUCED/MINIMAL boot mode.

summary: autoPreCompactionDump fires at >=55% pressure, not waiting for 70%
detail: Gap between 55-70% had no proactive state preservation. Now writes CURRENT_POSITION.md + COMPACTION_SNAPSHOT.md at 55%. Wired into autoHookWrapper.ts pressure block.

summary: DC edit_block fails on files with UTF-8 multi-byte chars (arrows, dashes)
detail: PRISM_RECOVERY_CARD.md has encoded arrows that cause 98% similarity match but not exact. Workaround: use PowerShell script with line-number replacement instead of edit_block for files with special chars.
